name: Stun TDS
description:
Thanks for testing this very early build of the game. It is very much in development, and the graphics have literally been made in Paint.net. It's just a gameplay prototype.

Controls

Controls
Tab - shop
WASD - movement
Cursor - aim
Left click - shoot
Right click - place an entity after purchasing it at the cursor's position

See more of my stuff at: https://github.com/techtide
